name: Problem Gamblers
description:
You've wasted your youth, and the Demiurge has decided to subject you to the ultimate punishment for allowing your gambling addiction to take over your life.

3D: W A S D to Move

       Hold LMB to Charge Throw

       Escape to Open Menu

2D: W A S D to Move

       LMB to Shoot

(Try to get as many dice on the roulette wheel as you can or you'll regret it)
